short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates your daily mealplan spendings and your projected remaining balance by the end of the year.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension calculates your daily meal spending and provides projections for your remaining balance at the end of the academic year. See how to better manage your spending and get insights before topping up.

Key Features:
- Track your daily spending for both Residence Dollars and Flex accounts 
- See your balanced projected by the end of the year
- Easy to use and designed specifically for Western University students
